//Login and Register Strings Sign In Please login to enjoy a lovable Journey with us. Email Password Forget Password? Remember me Don\'t have account? Register now Register Please register to enjoy a lovable Journey with us. Continue Already have an account? Login Please enter valid email! Photos are better for your profile.\nYou can change these later. Add your photos Make sure it\'s your photo Be happy in your photo Photo should not be blur Photo guidelines First name Last name What is your name? What\'s your gender? Shows your age to potential matches. Choose which best describe you.\nIt will help your potentials matcher to know about your gender. Who would you like to date? Please allow permission for adding photos. There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted. If you delete your account, you will permanently lose your profile, message, photos and matches. \n\nIf you delete your account, this action cannot be undone.\n\nAre you sure you want to delete your account? It\'s important to us that Giggling Singles is a welcoming and safe space for everyone. Unfortunately, we found that you\'ve violated our Terms of Use and so we\'ve made the decision of removing you from the Giggling Singles Platform. \n\nYou will no longer be able to access your Giggling Singles account or create new accounts in the future.
